desc: mHdr creates a header template file from location, size, resolution and rotation inputs. In order to support object name lookup for the location string argument, this service must have a network connection available.

arguments.name: locstr
arguments.desc: A (quoted if necessary) string containing a coordinate or the name of an object on the sky.

arguments.name: csys
arguments.desc: Coordinate system string (e.g. 'EquJ', 'Galactic', etc. Fairly forgiving.

arguments.name: band2MASS
arguments.desc: Optional argument when mosaicking 2MASS, adds proper MAGZP value.

return.name: count
return.desc: Number of lines in output file.
